about.title: About Work4Earth
about.missionText: Work4Earth is a data-driven platform connecting individuals in low-income or climate-vulnerable regions with verified environmental micro-jobs. We empower people to earn sustainable income while contributing to climate resilience through tree planting, solar maintenance, and flood prevention work.
about.sdgText: We're committed to reducing inequalities by providing equal access to dignified work opportunities that support both people and planet. Our platform bridges the gap between environmental action and economic empowerment.
about.step1Text: Create your account as a worker, volunteer, or NGO organization
about.step2Text: Browse or search for verified eco-jobs on our interactive map
about.step3Text: Complete jobs, earn income, and track your environmental contribution
about.newsletter: Subscribe to our newsletter for updates

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using Work4Earth, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.
terms.userAccountsText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account. You must provide accurate information during registration and keep it updated.
terms.jobsText: NGOs posting jobs must ensure all job listings are legitimate and comply with local labor laws. Workers must complete jobs as described and report completion accurately. False reporting may result in account suspension.
terms.paymentsText: Payments for completed jobs are processed according to the terms specified in each job listing. Work4Earth facilitates connections but does not guarantee payment from job posters.
terms.conductText: Users must not engage in fraudulent activities, harassment, or misuse of the platform. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
terms.liabilityText: Work4Earth provides the platform as-is and is not liable for disputes between users, job completion issues, or any damages arising from platform use.
terms.changesText: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: Work4Earth is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.
privacy.collectionText: We collect information you provide during registration (name, email, location, skills), job activity data, and usage analytics to improve our services.
privacy.usageText: Your data is used to facilitate job matching, track environmental impact, improve platform functionality, and communicate important updates. We do not sell your personal information.
privacy.sharingText: We share minimal information necessary for job matching (your name and skills with potential employers). Location data is only shared in aggregate for platform statistics.
privacy.securityText: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption and secure authentication protocols.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to enhance user experience and collect usage analytics. You can control cookie preferences in your browser settings.
privacy.contactText: For privacy-related questions, contact us at privacy@work4earth.org
